PCA plot of samples

calcPlotPCAscores.Rd

PCA plot of samples

Usage

calcPlotPCAscores(
  pcaObj,
  dataList,
  filterObj,
  pcaDimensionOne = 1,
  pcaDimensionTwo = 2,
  showScoresLabels,
  xInterval = NULL,
  yInterval = NULL,
  downloadLayout = FALSE
)

Arguments

pcaObj
dataList
filterObj
pcaDimensionOne

first PCA axis

pcaDimensionTwo

second PCA axis

showScoresLabels
xInterval
yInterval
downloadLayout

boolean, set to TRUE for a different figure better suited for printing

Value

makes a plot, returns NULL
